ApolloFaq.Question: How do you know when you have run out of invisible ink?

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
Can you say peter piper picked a peck of pickeled peppers. If peter piper picked a peck of pickeled peppers, how many pickled peppers did peter piper pick?

Etiam rhoncus. Maecenas tempus, tellus eget condimentum rhoncus, sem quam semper libero, sit amet adipiscing sem neque sed ipsum. Nam quam nunc, blandit vel, luctus pulvinar, hendrerit id, lorem. Maecenas nec odio et ante tincidunt tempus.
